main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object was reported on July 25, 1953, in Dayton, Ohio, by Mrs. Frank Lutz and her husband.
interesting points: The object was first observed at 3:30 pm and was reported to travel horizontally and later vertically,The object appeared small, like a balloon, and made no noise during its observation,The witnesses estimated the object's speed to be around 40-50 mph,The object was described as white with no glowing or radiation of light,The Lutzes were unsure if it was a weather balloon, prompting the report.
witness description: Mrs. Frank Lutz and her husband
